17 import actionlib
18 import rospy
19 from threading import Event, Timer
20 
21 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.msg import ExecuteProgramAction
22 
23 from std_msgs.msg import String
24 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import AdvertiseShutdownRequest
25 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import Trigger
26 
27 from ..common.gpio_expander_adapters import GpioManager
28 from ..common.rpi_ros_utils import send_shutdown_command, send_reboot_command
29 from ..common.abstract_shutdown_manager import AbstractShutdownManager
30 from .mcp_io_objects import McpIOManager
31 
32 
33 class ShutdownManager(AbstractShutdownManager):
34  SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT = 10
35 
36  def __init__(self, mcp_manager=None, fake=False):
37  super(ShutdownManager, self).__init__(fake=fake)
38 
39  try:
40  self.__turn_off_sound_name = rospy.get_param("/niryo_robot_sound/robot_sounds/turn_off_sound")
41  except KeyError:
42  self.__turn_off_sound_name = ""
43 
44  self.__shutdown_requested = False
45  self.__shutdown_event = Event()
46  self.__sound_status_sub = None
47  self.__current_sound = ""
48 
49  pins_type = rospy.get_param("~shutdown_manager/pins_type")
50 
51  if pins_type == 'mcp' and mcp_manager is not None:
52  self.__manager = mcp_manager
53  elif pins_type == 'mcp':
54  self.__manager = McpIOManager()
55  elif pins_type == 'gpio':
56  self.__manager = GpioManager()
57 
58  self.__shutdown_output = self.__manager.add_output(rospy.get_param("~shutdown_manager/digital_output"),
59  "shutdown_output")
60  self.__shutdown_input = self.__manager.add_button(rospy.get_param("~shutdown_manager/digital_input"),
61  "shutdown_input")
62 
63  self.__shutdown_input.on_press(self.request_shutdown)
64 
65  def request_shutdown(self):
66  if not self.__shutdown_requested:
67  self.__shutdown_requested = True
68  self.__shutdown_output.value = True
69  self._advertise_shutdown_service.call(AdvertiseShutdownRequest.SHUTDOWN)
70  send_shutdown_command_thread = Timer(1.0, self.shutdown)
71  send_shutdown_command_thread.start()
72 
73  def shutdown(self):
74  self.__shutdown_output.value = False
75  self.__shutdown_input.disable_on_press()
76  self.__stop_move()
77  self.wait_end_of_sound()
78  if not self._fake:
79  send_shutdown_command(learning_mode=False)
80 
81  def reboot(self):
82  self.__stop_move()
83  self.wait_end_of_sound()
84  if not self._fake:
85  send_reboot_command(learning_mode=False)
86 
87  @staticmethod
88  def __stop_move():
89  """
90  Stop the robot movement
91  """
92  try:
93  stop_move_service = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/stop_command', Trigger)
94  stop_move_service()
95  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSInterruptException, rospy.ROSException):
96  pass
97 
98  try:
99  action_client = actionlib.SimpleActionClient('/niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2/execute_program',
100  ExecuteProgramAction)
101  action_client.cancel_all_goals()
102  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSInterruptException, rospy.ROSException):
103  pass
104 
105  def wait_end_of_sound(self):
106  self.__shutdown_event.clear()
107  self.__sound_status_sub = rospy.Subscriber("/niryo_robot_sound/sound", String, self.__callback_sound_state)
108  self.__shutdown_event.wait(self.SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT)
109 
110  def __callback_sound_state(self, msg):
111  if self.__current_sound == self.__turn_off_sound_name and msg.data == "":
112  self.__shutdown_event.set()
113  self.__current_sound = msg.data
